diff:
Reduced fleet subordinate sizes and overall fleet quantity to enable the ability to run DeadAirJobs on "Potato" quality.
With less combat ships there is room to lower the suggested Economy jobs. Faction AI can go beyond "Galaxy" if needed. Lowering Economy ships too far could potentially reduce performance rather than increasing due to Faction AI reacting in various ways to shortages.
Any commented out entries are still set to their default values based on DeadAirJobs 0.08. <-->
L ECONOMY SHIPS BELOW, MINERS & TRADERS Don't reduce ships which have lower Galaxy quota than vanilla, leave ones which were raised by only a small amount. 10%ish reduction for vanilla jobs 20%ish reduction for DeadAirJobs Actual percentage reductions will tend to be more than suggested, not going to be extremely exact with those <-->

COMBAT SHIPS WINGS/SUBORDINATES SETUP BELOW. Less fleets and bigger groups are preferred however there is a balancing act required in order to reduce the odds of all fleets joining into a single battle and literally experiencing sub 1FPS battles Reduced L fleet escorts, increased L escorts for XL fleets. L escorts for low quantity fleets left to the default Job, which is still lower than DeadAirJobs. Background Sim speed in empty sector is already improved quite a bit without the following subordinate changes. These mostly effect in sector situations (battles) as far as performance goes.
argon_destroyer_escort_l_xlwan argon_destroyer_escort_l_xlwan Note> FOCW mod by Blackrain changes the name of argon_carrier_patrol_xl_center_galaxy Job<-->

HOP Vanilla don't use carriers but compensates with bigger L groups. With DAJobs everyone has same fleet sizes but HOP has smaller total capacity. so their XL groups gain additional wing size<-->
